title: Ori and the Blind Forest - Definitive Edition OST
description:
Couldn't find any torrents containing these pieces, so i thought I'd better make one myself. 
Ripped the "official" you-tube video containing all the pieces, then used Audacity to separate each track and name it.



Â© 2016 Microsoft Corporation

This album contains the following material:

- New tracks from Ori : Definitive Edition
- Music from the 3 trailers that Moon Studios have released for the game.
- Music that was not released on the original soundtrack.
- A selection of music that was unused or cut from the original game.
- A selection of music from the original Ori prototype. 


DEFINITIVE EDITION

1. Main Theme - Definitive Edition
2. Naru's Origins I - Her Home
3. Through the Darkness
4. Naru's Origins II - A Friendship Formed
5. Dash Through Their Home
6. Naru's Origins III - A Broken Bond
7. A Closer Understanding of the Past

TRAILERS

8. Definitive Edition Trailer
9. E3 Trailer
10. Launch Trailer

UNRELEASED TRACKS (tracks that didn't make the cut on the original OST)

11. Swallows Nest
12. Climbing Further up the Ginso Tree
13. Confronting the Ram
14. The Mists Cleared
15. Hiding from Kuro
16. Arrival at the Sunstone
Travelling Through Horu Fields
Mount Horu Puzzle Rooms - Suite 1
Mount Horu Puzzle Rooms - Suite 2
Returning to the Spirit Tree (feat. Aeralie Brighton)

UNUSED TRACKS & PROTOTYPES

60 Second Trailer feat. Aeralie Brighton (unused)
Title Screen (unused)
Opening Scenes (unused)
Forward Momentum (unused)
Facing the Dark (alternate)
Fleeing Kuro (alternate)
Title Screen (prototype)
The Garden (prototype)
Rolling Through the Forest (prototype)

Owning this alongside the original album gives you just about all the music content in the game . 


As always, consider buying this to support the developers.
You can do it here
